comment: Prof. Brodak was honestly the best teacher I have ever had. She makes sure that all of her assignments have practical applications, and focuses on preparing students for future courses. Definitely take her if you have the chance!!

Do not take anyone else but her. Ms. Brodak is an amazing teachers. Very smart, interesting, beautiful teacher. One will have fun in her classroom. One will learn so much. We read so many amazing stories and poems. I have never had so much fun in a classroom before.

She's just phenominal. She enjoys poems and will have you read them often. If you don't understand what you read the night before, she has a powerpoint to explain everything. She is also very organized.

This Prof. was honestly amazing she created wonderful assignments and I enjoyed all of it. She made great gaming connections for papers and projects (which I enjoy) and gave you great freedom on each and every assignment. Also so many free grades.

She makes this class very fun and teaches you to write in different genres. You learn how to write very useful things like a memo, proposal, resume, and cover letter. She gives great feedback on all your work and helps you to become and much better writer.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--Would take again

comment: World Lit class was actually fun despite hating English normally. SHe has an encyclopedic knowledge of world history so her lectures were interesting and she has a weird sense of humor. Quiz every day but it is easy. Lots of writing on the exam but she helps you prepare. Wish I could take her again, she's awesome.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS

comment: She's very intelligent, clearly explains things and makes sure you understand them. She appreciates good work as well as good effort. Has no problem answering questions before or after class

One of the best professors I've had yet. Smart and funny in lecture, very organized and good at engaging the class to think outside the box. You can tell she cares about what she's teaching, which was very refreshing. Also, she was very accessible and easy to talk to when I had questions. I'll take her classes again for sure. Highly recommended.
Can't tell you the first thing we learned in this class. Can tell you she is distractingly beautiful and charming.
Very well organized professor. She obviously cares about our education and explains the material well. Her projects and assignments are given ample explanation and time to do well on.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--Caring

comment: Great professor. Makes literature interesting and inspiring if you're not really into it.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--SO MANY PAPERS

comment: Not lenient at all, if you miss just one single article or even a piece of paper in your assignments will fail you.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Awesome professor, most fun Ive had in a class. Learned a lot from her as well. The readings she assigns are interesting. Read before classes because she does have quizzes at the start of each class. They arent bad if you read. Dont procrastinate on the reading responses or the final project. Pay attention in class, take notes, & study.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--Amazing lectures

comment: She's HOT!! But get ready to read before every class and quiz everyday. Did I mention she's HOT?!?!?!
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.--TEST HEAVY

comment: I'm an engineering major and English has never been my favorite, but somehow Prof. Brodak changed that. I don't love the subject that much, however, I looked forward to going to her class because she is engaging and finds ways to make English interesting to a bunch of STEM majors. One of my favorite profs. Highly recommend. Put in the work though.

While there was reading to do before every class, she tried to make class engaging, and highly encouraged participation. Either I'm a really good writer or she is surprisingly lenient and supportive. I'm leaning towards both.  If you ever need help she's there for you.

Molly Brodak is a wonderful professor. There's reading and writing assigned every day, but she does a good job of picking interesting pieces. She clearly presents all the dates and deadlines far ahead of time. If you need any help or guidance she's there for you and can point you in the right direction. take advantage of this with the papers.
Great professor. She leaves helpful feedback along with thoughtful comments. Will take her again.

Everything you do is about heroes. We watched part of Kill Bill, watched an episode of Sailor Moon, and read various heroic stories. The class consists of one big assignment where you pick a hero and research them and write a sizable paper about them. But you have all semester to do it and its fun. The rest is reading and in-class assignments.
She is hot.
Great teacher. Will take again if possible.
Covers material and gives great examples. Gives plenty of formats to work with. real world writing topics and material. Cancels class for individual conferences on important projects.

Best English class ever. Actually teaches you how to write and cares about helping everybody. Ppl who said she is a hard grader are just lazy, you just have to follow instructions exactly or she takes points off. Not hard. Doesn't hurt that she is easy on the eyes.

Easy assignments but grade hard. She is very nice and will talk to you. Is always welcoming during her office hours. Sign up with a friend. She likes group assignments. Sometimes the classes are really short. You are supposed to read but you don't have to to pass the class. You do need the textbook.

Some in my class said they didn't like her and thought she was strict and mean. She's actually very nice. She was strict in TCOMM because it is a subject where detail is important. She is helpful and responded to all of my emails. Easy A because the grading criteria is very clear. If taking TCOMM then you'll have an easy quiz in each class.

I loved her class and would recommend it to anyone. She teaches clearly and grades fairly. She really appreciates your effort. Take the class seriously and you will do well and learn a ton. I would definitely take from her again!!
